name: Andrew Kwong
content: Andrew Kwong Andrew Kwong Andrew Kwong I am an Assistant Professor at UNC Chapel Hill in the Department of Computer Science. My research is in computer security and applied cryptography, with a focus on side-channel attacks and defenses. Contact: andrew@cs.unc.edu Google Scholar Teaching COMP 790-184 Hardware Security and Side-Channels      Spring 2025, 2024 COMP 790-185 Research Topics in Computer Security      Fall 2025, 2024, 2023
